description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2hti9","text":"This protocol describes the procedure of differentiating hPSCs into early cortical spheroids following an adaptation of a published protocol (Yoon et al 2019, Paşca et al. 2015).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chfjb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22l8u","text":"Protocol overview","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2r46d","text":"A. Media Formulations","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qa03","text":"B. Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5p9fe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67u09","text":"Initial notes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"421l4","text":"A list of reagents and relevant vendor information can be found in the table listed under the materials tab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7rj8l","text":"Grow stem cells feeder-free on 6-well plates as described in (dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.b4mcqu2w).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":41}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B550D60CC58D4CC182128E95AA558CBA","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.b4mcqu2w"}}}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6a8de","text":"On day -1 of differentiation remove hESC Media and feed with hESC KSR Media + 10uM Rock Inhibitor (1:1000).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"95i0h","text":"Pre-coat an aggrewell plate according to manufacturer instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"86f28","text":"On day 0 of differentiation, aspirate media and add   of PBS- onto each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bsuc8","text":"Immediately Remove PBS- and add  of Accutase (1:3 Diluted with PBS-) onto each well of the 6 well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"vj9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aftgb","text":"Return plate to incubator for ~  or until cells are dissociated into single cell suspension.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2af8l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6o08u","text":"Remove plate from incubator. Pool the cells into a 15mL conical tube per plate (6mL total volume).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f0o6n","text":"Using   hESC Wash media, rinse the wells and dilute the cell-Accutase suspension.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1j0gk","text":"Spin down cells for   at   to  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"43rsq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"200","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8m3h3","text":"Remove the supernatant from the falcon tube using a sterile glass pipette. Be careful not to aspirate any of the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a3ctm","text":"Resuspend the cells in   of hESC KSR Media + 10uM Rock Inhibitor (1:1000).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9hjbs","text":"Using a 5mL serological pipette, filter cells through a 40 µm cell strainer into a new 50 ml conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bu9l3","text":"Take two sets of   of cell suspension. Mix each set with 10 μl trypan blue dye, which comes with the Countess Cell Counting Chamber Slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5e1pk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8qqjh","text":"Count cells with Countess automated cell counter or hemocytometer, averaging the counts from the two sets.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5r661","text":"Resuspend the cells to a concentration of 18 million cells per 5 mL of media (3.6 million cells per mL) in hESC KSR Media + 10µM Rock Inhibitor (1:1000).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eu7km","text":"If needed, combine tubes from multiple plates and re-concentrate by spinning down at   to   and resuspending in an appropriate volume of hESC Media + Rock Inhibitor 1:1000.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":90,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"djj8t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"200","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1l240","text":"Transfer  of suspension to one well of a pre-coated 6-well Aggrewell 800 plate. Return plate to the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9car2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ap5ir","text":"The next day (Day 1), prepare neural induction media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6l6nv","text":"Remove the aggrewell plate from the incubator and use a serological pipette to transfer the newly formed Embryoid Bodies (EBs) to a 15 ml conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d70ju","text":"Allow EBs to settle (1-2 mins, but check before aspirating to ensure EB retention) and aspirate off media, taking special care to not suck up the EBs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a8v03","text":"Resuspend in 5 ml of neural induction media and deposit into one well of a 6-well ultra-low attachment plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d6n7c","text":"Repeat steps 17-20 to change media each day until Day 6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"479bh","text":"On Day 6, remove cell suspension from the plate and deposit into a 15 ml falcon tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a1u0e","text":"Allow spheroids to settle to the bottom of the tube (~1-2 mins).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dqimr","text":"While settling, make neural precursor expansion media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cpe81","text":"Remove the supernatant from the settled spheroid suspension.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"hqi3","text":"Resuspend spheroids in neural precursor expansion media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fquvl","text":"Return to the Ultra-Low Attachment plate and return the plate to the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"119vp","text":"Repeat steps 22-27 to feed cells every day until Day 16 and then every other day until Day 25","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dcqd4","text":"On day 25, prepare Cortical differentiation media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"68rp8","text":"Remove cell suspension from the plate and deposit into a 15 ml falcon tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b13bd","text":"Allow spheroids to settle to the bottom of the tube (~1-2 mins).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"61d3i","text":"Remove the supernatant from the settled cell suspension.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6fp26","text":"Resuspend cells in Cortical differentiation media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a94pc","text":"Return to the Ultra-Low Attachment plate and return the plate to the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"18g3g","text":"Repeat steps 30-34 every four days (d29, 33, 37, 41) day until Day 43","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d6t7b","text":"On day 43, change the media as above, but replace with only hCS media with no additives.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Growth and Maintenance of Human Cortical Spheroids
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f65sb","text":"Change media by sedimenting the spheroids, removing the supernatant, resuspending in hCS Media, and returning to the Ultra-Low Attachment plate every four days until the termination of the experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Cortical spheroid differentiation
